thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com
thread.title: Bo Page

author: Bo Page
title: Bo Page
text: Love the online interactive builder. Really helped me feel confidant in what I would be getting. You never know how a font or color will really look until you try different ones so this interactive tool helps a great deal. I would have given 5 stars, but they missed a message/special instructions I wrote asking them to make the sign for the inside of the window, but they immediately sent out a corrected sign within a day. I was impressed with this. Would definitely refer them to others.
